mapper.sql: eweel.warning_event_execute_log_id, eweel.warning_event_config_id, eweel.execute_result, eweel.handle_result, eweel.execute_time, eweel.remark, eweel.status, eweel.org_id, eweel.create_user_id, eweel.create_time, eweel.modified_user_id, eweel.modified_time, eweel.is_delete, eweel.option1, eweel.option2, eweel.option3, eweel.execute_parameter, eweel.execute_result_message
mapper.select: SELECT eweep.warning_event_execute_push_log_id as 'warningEventExecutePushLogId', eweep.message_push_result as 'messagePushResult', eweep.personnel_level 'personnelLevel', eweep.handle_time 'handleTime', ewpc.handle_time as 'aging', ewee.execute_time as 'executeTime', ewee.execute_parameter as 'executeParameter', ewpc.notification_method as 'notificationMethod', CASE ewpc.handle_time_unit WHEN '0' THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,ewee.execute_time,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')) WHEN '1' THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,ewee.execute_time,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')) WHEN '2' THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,ewee.execute_time,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')) END 'untreatedTime', eweep.warning_event_execute_log_id as 'warningEventExecuteLogId', ewpc.warning_push_config_id 'warningPushConfigId', ewee.warning_event_config_id 'warningEventConfigId' FROM ews_warning_event_execute_push_log eweep LEFT JOIN ews_warning_event_execute_log ewee ON eweep.warning_event_execute_log_id = ewee.warning_event_execute_log_id LEFT JOIN ews_warning_push_config ewpc ON ewee.warning_event_config_id = ewpc.warning_event_config_id AND ewpc.personnel_level = eweep.personnel_level LEFT JOIN ews_warning_push_config_re_wui ewpcr ON ewpcr.warning_push_config_id = ewpc.warning_push_config_id WHERE ewee.handle_result = 0
